## Complete DHDA variable list

To get the complete DHDA variable list, click [this link](https://github.com/steno-aarhus/registers-project-database/blob/main/sds/registers-and-variables/Variabelliste_709627_SDS_20250407.xlsx)

This will take you to an Excel file on GitHub.com with the complete variable list. To download the file, click the download button ![](/images/download-icon.svg) in the top right corner of the page.

## Overview of all registers from DHDA

On The DHDA's webpage you can read more about all the other national health registries you can apply for 

[Overview of registers](https://sundhedsdatastyrelsen.dk/data-og-registre/nationale-sundhedsregistre) (both in Danish and in English)

## Registers from DHDA in the SDCA project database

Below you will find a full describtion of DHDA registers and variables in the project database

::: {.callout-warning collapse="true"}

NOTE: The Drug Statistics Register (LMDB) are described under DST, as variables from this register are added through the project application in DDV. However, you still need to apply DHDA to get permission to use the data.
